explanation: Rire général (General laughter) is a general action performed by the characters. It is not a violent action (Category 1), an aside (Category 2), a delivery manner (Category 3), an entrance or exit (Categories 4 and 5), an interaction (Category 6), a specific movement (Category 7), music (Category 8), a long narrative description (Category 9), an object interaction (Category 10), or a setting description (Category 11). It is a general action that involves multiple characters, making it fitting for Category 0.
